TopicTitle: Why are recordings of KSP in space so dark

Articles.Content: Just like the title says, is there a way to stop this problem without having to increase the brightness of the clip through the editor?

You may want to try this:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/71536-0-24-2-Ambient-Light-Adjustment-1-1-3-Who-needs-lights-in-space-!
